text: Anyone has an update on the Customer Success Health score beta? It is currently unavailable but we have a couple of clients asking for this.

Reminder: There are lots of great ways to stay connected with whatâ€™s happening in HubSpot development. To be made aware of any changes that affect developers we recommend <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|subscribing to our developer changelog>. We post announcements about new developer facing functionality as well as communicate from there if we need to make <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/breaking-change-definition|breaking changes>.
